channel.title: Cameron Young – News
channel.description: Churchill Scholar at the University of Cambridge

item.title: Award-Winning Students 'Exemplify Northeastern's Highest Ideals'
item.description: Northeastern celebrated its most accomplished learners at the 12th Annual Student Academic Honors Convocation.

item.title: Northeastern’s first Churchill Scholar will study breast cancer at Cambridge University
item.description: Cameron Young, who will graduate from Northeastern in May, recently earned the Churchill Scholarship, an award granted to outstanding American students to attend Cambridge University in England.

item.title: A Future in Cancer Research for this Goldwater Scholar
item.description: Cameron Young, E’22, chemical engineering and biochemistry, wants to see medical research translate directly to personalized treatments.

item.title: Goldwater Scholarships Go To 3 Undergrads Immersed in Promising Science
item.description: Three Northeastern students—Sabrina Bond, Spencer Lake Jacobs-Skolik, and Cameron Young—have been selected from a pool of more than 1,200 nominees to receive the prestigious Barry Goldwater Scholarship.

image.title: Northeastern’s first Churchill Scholar will Study Breast Cancer
